title: [Discussion]I joined pes ec suppose through branch I get rr next year,how hard will it be for me to adapt making friends and all that etc?
content: Seniors pls help and no I donâ€™t wanna first focus on this year etc

comments.body:
3rd sem will have mostly new ppl anyway (coz physics cycle and chem cycle will get merged).   
your thinking way too ahead. A lot can happen in first year.  
and branch change will be based on available seats + how your batch performs.
So wait in 1st year people from different disciplines will be in the same classroom or will ece students will be grouped together?
yes all branches in engineering will study in either phy/chem cycle for first year. third sem onwards you ll get  classes assigned according to your branch.
How hard is branch change though If I may ask?
Bro starting u will think like this only but @the end u r ðŸ’€ðŸ’€
